item.description:
FREE Beginner Level Flapper & Gangster Dance Lessons
FREE...FREE...FREE...FREE...FREE...FREE           February 26th , Global Fitness Center, Leominster, MA Flapper&Gangster

FREE BEGINNER LEVEL FLAPPER & GANGSTER DANCE LESSONS

1 to 2 pm
Side by Side Charleston

2pm to 3pm
Jitterbug

3pm to 4pm
Swing Balboa

No Experience Necessary... Come With or Without A Partner...No Cost Or Obligation

 

 

These lessons can prepare you for a wonderful fund raising event ......

 

Get Ready To Frisk Your Whiskers At...
The Cats Meow Speakeasy Tasting Gala Event to Benefit Health Alliance
When: Thursday, March 3rd, 2011
Time: 5:30-8:30pm
Where: Four Points Sheraton Hotel in Leominster, MA!
Tickets: $50.00

THE JOINT IS GONNA BE HOPPIN'!

http://www.umassmemorial.org/CatsMeowSpeakeasyTastingEven
item.how_to_find_us: Dancce studio is in the back but use front entrance.
item.why: It's free, it's fun and it's great exercise.
